readable.title: 539705321_99406e5820
readable.content: A kid in red falls as he struggles with a kid in white to get to a soccer ball . Children chasing the ball in a soccer game . Little boys running and chasing a soccer ball . The boy with the red soccer suit is falling down while the boy in the white shirt has his eyes on the ball . Two teams of children , one in red and the other in white , are playing soccer .
